title: FSIB to interview candidates for SBI Chairman post on Tuesday
description: FSIB to select replacement for retiring SBI Chairman Dinesh Khara. Decision by Cabinet Committee, headed by PM Modi. FSIB led by Bhanu Pratap Sharma. Panel includes Financial Services Secretary, Public Enterprises Secretary, and RBI Deputy Governor. Animesh Chauhan, Deepak Singhal, Shailendra Bhandari also on panel.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
